body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! This is Charles Carter from Blossom Boutique, how may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Charles, my name is Christine Sanders. I recently ordered a bouquet from your store, and I'm sad to say the flowers didn't quite meet my expectations.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Christine. We always aim for the highest quality with our products. Could you please provide me with your order number and the date of delivery so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is F-zero four two one BC and the delivery date was April second.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. I have your order details now. Could you describe the issue with the product quality?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, several of the flowers were wilting and the arrangement did not look fresh. It was quite disappointing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that could be disappointing, and I apologize for the inconvenience. We strive for excellence and this certainly doesn't align with our standards. I will report this to our quality control team right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: To make this right, we can offer you a full refund or send a new arrangement. Which would you prefer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I would appreciate a new arrangement, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Christine. We’ll send a new arrangement out to you with our sincerest apologies. Expect it to arrive by the end of this week.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Lastly, for our records and to ensure your satisfaction is monitored, may I have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have updated our records. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Christine. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you for handling this so promptly, Charles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Christine. Thank you for your time and for choosing Blossom Boutique. Have a great day!
